text: This is Louise. She is a dinosaur. But she pretends to be a designer so that people will hire her. People think that dinosaurs canâ€™t do design. And that is true because they are extinct.
This is Pontus. He does the blip-blop like a robot, so you can understand why his emoticon is a robot. His habitat is inside the [blip-blop] box. He likes it there.
